name: postgis_x3d_nodejs_viewer
description: PostGIS Minimialist X3D Viewer  ================ This viewer is a viewer for viewing PostGIS http://postgis.net geometry queries utilizing PostGIS 2.0+,  X3DOM http://www.x3dom.org/ , JQuery http://jquery.com, color picker JQuery plugin and a Web server that supports your language of choice (ASP.NET w. npgsql.net utilizing C# or VB.Net) or PHP.  It is a loose wrapper around the PostGIS ST_AsX3D function ([http://postgis.net/docs/ST_AsX3D.html]) .
